properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MYREVIEW WHERE MTYPE = 1 AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RUNM, A.* FROM(SELECT MID , MTYPE , CATEGORY_NAME , MTITLE , MCONTENT , USER_NAME , MCOUNT , CREATE_DATE , M.MODIFY_DATE , M.STATUS FROM MYREVIEW M JOIN B_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_ID) JOIN MEMBER ON(MWRITER = USER_NO) WHERE MTYPE = 1 AND M.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY MID DESC) A ) WHERE RUNM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE MYREVIEW SET MCOUNT = MCOUNT + 1 WHERE MID = ?

SELECT MID , CATEGORY_ID , CATEGORY_NAME , MTITLE , MCONTENT , MWRITER , USER_NAME , MCOUNT , CREATE_DATE , M.MODIFY_DATE FROM MYREVIEW M JOIN B_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_ID) JOIN MEMBER ON(MWRITER = USER_NO) WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y' AND MID = ?

INSERT INTO MYREVIEW ( MID , MTYPE , CATEGORY_ID , MTITLE , MCONTENT , MWRITER , MCOUNT , CREATE_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_MID.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , DEFAULT , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , DEFAULT )
